This issue applies to less than 30 units of its W700 Lose Weight product. While the vitamin bottles are labeled accurately, less than 30-bottles of UBERTEST TESTOSTERONE EXTREME BOOST FOR MEN were placed into W700 Lose Weight boxes. The outer box is labeled as the W7
